text: @Strandjunker Trump’s cheerleaders, lackeys, sycophants are as crooked  & deranged as him! From crowds that show up to his rallies to those sitting in congress! And don’t forget his donors who are getting huge amounts of the Coronavirus funds! Not the people that really need it! Disgusting!
